responses: Can you please describe your symptoms?
Please tell me what you are going through.
Please focus on breathing regularly. Can you elaborate your symptoms?
Do not worry. Kindly tell me what you feel exactly?
Sorry to hear that. Can you briefly describe your symptoms?

patterns: I can’t breathe easily and my chest hurts.
I have chest and arm pain and I can’t breathe
I feel faint and weak. My chest and back hurts
I am feeling dizzy and have pain in my chest and back

Difficult to breathe, chest and back pain
responses: Please try taking regular breaths, even if they aren’t deep. Please copy paste this number on your keypad and press dial: 8992
Please copy and paste: 8992 to your keypad. And press the call button. Help is on its way
I have alerted your emergency contacts. Please just focus on this text, and breathe in and out regularly. Breathe in, Breathe out.
Your Doctor has been informed. You have people coming to help you, until then, please focus on breathing in and out.

patterns: I can’t breathe properly. I feel very anxious
I am sweating, can’t take deep breaths. This is freaking me out
My chest feels tight, and I can’t breathe. I feel very jittery
I feel nauseous and my chest feels tight. It’s difficult to breathe
My mouth feels dry, chest tightness and cannot breathe properly
Keep drinking water but mouth is dry, can’t breathe properly, keep panicking
I can’t think clearly, chest is heavy and can’t take deep breaths.
Feel queasy and my head feels foggy. Can’t think
I am trying to sleep, but unable to breathe properly, and am sweating
responses: Understood. Please do not worry. Based on your symptoms you have a panic attack. Just focus on breathing regularly, do not worry if these are not long, deep breaths. Eventually you will be able to take one
Breathe in for 3 seconds, hold for 3 seconds, release for 3 seconds and repeat. I assure you your breathing will return to normal. Do not think of anything else.

Please focus on your surroundings, and think of 5 things you can see, 4 things you can touch, 3 things you can hear, 2 things you can smell and one thing you can taste. Focus on breathing regularly the whole time
Please close your eyes and place one hand on your chest. Continue to breathe with pursed lips. Do not worry if these are not deep breaths.
Based on your symptoms, this is nothing but a bout of panic. I encourage you to focus on regular breathing. You can engage yourself with your listed hobby: painting. Do not think about anything else.
Close your eyes and focus on breathing regularly. Its alright if these aren’t long satisfying breaths. You are breathing regularly, so you are alright.

Contrary to what you might think, your body doesn’t require you to take deep, long breaths each time. Instead, focus on breathing regularly. You will be alright. Just focus on breathing, and try engaging in your listed hobby.
